channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Lady Gaga Makes Triumphant Return With The Mayhem Ball’s Homecoming Show in New York City: 7 Best Moments
item.description: Lady Gaga slays NYC with The Mayhem Ball! 🌟 Relive the magic with these top 7 moments! 🎤✨ #LadyGaga #MayhemBall #NYCconcert

item.title: Tito Double P Announces ¡AY MAMÁ! Mexico Tour
item.description: 🎉 Tito Double P bringing those fuego vibes to Mexico! 🔥 Who's ready to dance all night? 💃🕺 #TitoDoublePMexicoTour

item.title: Big Boi Announces Washing Machine That Plays “So Fresh, So Clean”
item.description: 🎶 Laundry day just got a whole lot groovier! Big Boi dropping a washing machine that's music to our ears! 🧼🎵 #FreshAndCleanRevolution

item.title: Sammy Hagar Announces Live Album Featuring His “Best of All Worlds” Band
item.description: 🎸🎤 Sammy Hagar brings the heat with a live album! Get ready to rock out with his ultimate band lineup! 🔥 #SammyHagar #RockNRoll

item.title: Ruel Previews New Album ‘Kicking My Feet’ With Bluesy Single ‘The Suburbs’
item.description: 🎶 Dive into @oneruel's soulful vibes with his latest single 'The Suburbs' from upcoming album 'Kicking My Feet'! 🌟 #NewMusicAlert 🎸
